text: The Opel Cascada was a convertible car produced by the German carmaker Opel from 2013 to 2018. It is the convertible version of the Opel Astra. The model is sold as the Vauxhall Cascada in the UK, and as the Buick Cascada in the US. Cascada Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Opel Cascada
